description: Try this wholemeal blueberry pancake recipe for a healthier breakfast the whole family will love. Top these fluffy pancakes with ricotta and blueberries.
name: Healthier Blueberry & Ricotta Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide pancakes among plates. Dollop each with remaining ricotta and spoon over blueberry mixture.
